other_category.themes: No results found, did you mean themes?
other_category.plugins: No results found, did you mean plugins?

external_repo_security.main:
External repos pose security risks as they are not controlled by GooseMod developers. We are not responsible for any dangers because of external repos added by users.

If you do not trust the owner of this repo do not use it as it could compromise your Discord install.

Please confirm adding this repo by pressing OK.
external_repo_security.bad_pgp:
This repo is not known or trusted (no PGP verification), please be extra careful. Make sure you trust the owner(s) of this repo completely.

To solve this issue ask the repo maintainer to add PGP support.

Please reconfirm adding this repo by pressing OK.

subtexts.experimental_warning: Experimental settings are likely incomplete and unstable, which may result in a reduced experience
subtexts.tweaks_description: Minor changes like small UI changes to make GooseMod be how you like

main_separators.title: Main Separators
main_separators.note: Show separators between main GooseMod settings

store_in_home.title: Store In Home
store_in_home.note: Put GooseMod Store options in home instead of in settings

auto_update.title: Auto Update
auto_update.note: Automatically update repos and modules every hour

new_module_notifications.title: New Module Notifications
new_module_notifications.note: Shows a toast each time a new module is added to the Store

purge_caches.title: Purge Caches
purge_caches.note: Purges (completely removes) most caches GooseMod uses

start_tour.title: Start Tour
start_tour.note: Go through GooseMod's startup tour again

copy_debug_info.title: Copy Debug Info
copy_debug_info.note: Copies information on setup and GooseMod for reporting and debugging

reset_goosemod.title: Reset GooseMod
reset_goosemod.note: Resets GooseMod completely: removes all preferences and modules; like a first-time install

create_backup.title: Create Backup
create_backup.note: Creates a file for backup of your GooseMod modules and settings

restore_backup.title: Restore Backup
restore_backup.note: Restore your GooseMod modules and settings via a backup file, **only restore backups you trust**

data_attributes.title: Data Attributes
data_attributes.note: Add data attributes to some elements for some themes to use

force_theme_settings.title: Force Theme Settings
force_theme_settings.note: Force auto-generated settings for all themes

placeholder_image.title: Placeholder Image
placeholder_image.note: Use a placeholder image in the Store for modules without images

collapsible_home_category.title: Collapsible Home Category
collapsible_home_category.note: Let home category be collapsible via icon
